text: Egerukhay () is a rural locality (an aul) in Egerukhayskoye Rural Settlement of Koshekhablsky District, Adygea, Russia. The population of this aul was 1635 as of 2018. There are 21 streets. == Geography == The aul is located on the left bank of the Laba River. == Ethnicity == The aul is inhabited by Adyghes or Circassians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Koshekhablsky District
title: Egerukhay
